data.oai_dc:dc: Genetic dataset in Genepop format including 516 tadpole samples of Pelophylax perezi, from 17 populations located across Sierra de Guadarrama (Central Spain), genotyped at 15 microsatellite loci.
Accumulation curves|Allelic richness|Diversity profile|Expected heterozygosity|Minimum sample size|Sibship analysis
